class_notes: This course is for ENVS majors in their final semester of study. Please email Leah Thomas at leah.thomas@emory.edu for permission to enroll if you are a graduating senior.
course_description: This course is required for all ENVS majors (BA and BS) in their final semester prior to graduation.During this course you will develop a capstone portfolio that includes  examples of past coursework and has written reflections evaluating your academic growth throughout the major.
schedule_location: F 1:30pm-2:20pm in Math & Science Center - W301
